descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Dirk Nowitzki makes a nice defensive play to block Michael Kidd-Gilchrist's shot attempt early in the first quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Dirk extends for good block) 2018/03/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dirk extends for good block

videos.description: Dwayne Bacon scores the pull-up jumper, draws the foul and completes the 3-point play at the end of the first quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Bacon finishes and-1 bucket) 2018/03/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bacon finishes and-1 bucket

videos.description: Willy Hernangomez finds Malik Monk inside the paint who finishes at the rim with an easy two-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Monk gets open for flush) 2018/03/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Monk gets open for flush

videos.description: Dennis Smith Jr. shows patience then drives between two defenders and punishes the rim with a two-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Smith throws down driving dunk) 2018/03/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Smith throws down driving dunk

videos.description: Dwight Howard gets open to receive the lob from Marvin Williams then finishes at the rim with a tough two-handed reverse slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Williams, Howard connect for tough alley-oop reverse dunk) 2018/03/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Williams, Howard connect for tough alley-oop reverse dunk

videos.description: With less than 12 seconds left in the game, Dennis Smith Jr. loses the ball and Kemba Walker dives to keep it alive for the Hornets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Kemba makes clutch defensive play) 2018/03/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kemba makes clutch defensive play
